array.string: Fix lag in description field text entry.
Fix issue where search results for tags with duplicates would display incorrect frequencies.
Fix issue that prevented j/k keys from working while searching for bookmarks.
Fix issue where a visual glitch would occur when bulk-deleting bookmarks.
Fix issue where tags would not be deleted when bookmarks were deleted remotely.
Fix crash that occurred after adding a new bookmark or viewing an unread bookmark.
Fix various crashes when reloading bookmarks.
Fix crash when rearranging feeds on the main feed list.
Fix crash that occurred after adding a new bookmark or viewing an unread bookmark.
Fix issue where tag list would skip the first section ('A' or '#').
TextExpander integration can now be disabled.
Vastly improve responsiveness of description editor when TextExpander functionality has not been enabled.
Group similar tags (e.g., 'apple', 'Apple', and 'APPLE') together in the tag list.
Prevent "Search" and "Tags" on feed list screen from moving based on device orientation.
Prevent keyboard shortcuts from interfering with search when viewing bookmarks.
Switch the default add bookmark prompt behavior to only prompt once for each URL.
Fix issue where edits made to existing bookmarks would not succeed.
Fix issue where bookmark edit prompt would always appear, regardless of settings, when an existing bookmark's URL was on the clipboard.
Fix issue where sending URLs to Instapaper would fail for certain users.
Fix issue where adding a bookmark via URL scheme on iPad would open a full-screen editor instead of a form sheet.
Fix issue where edits were not immediately reflected in the bookmark list after editing with the swipe gesture.
Fix issue where TextExpander snippets would not sync appropriately.
Fix an issue with URL clipboard detection where the app wouldn't prompt to add or edit a bookmark when a URL was on the clipboard.
